channel.title: Need help on Port Fowarding!
channel.description:
Looks like this..
Public ip address= Networked computer/device= protocol= WAN connection= Forward to port=
....PLz help me thanx![br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 04:43:23 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Need help on Port Fowarding!
item.dc:creator: @logging logging
item.description:
@logging wrote:

Public ip address=(your ip adress, go to run, type ipconfig/all and see your ip adress)
Networked computer/device=(your network…)
protocol=(ip+port+)
WAN connection=(your Wan connection. if haven’t created. create one on your ip adress site.)
Forward to port= (your port…+ moparscapes port)
hope it helps

Read full topic
